text: Miriam Rodriguez Martinez (around 1967 - 10 May 2017) from San Fernando, Tamaulipas, Mexico. She is a Mexican human rights activist. She became a member of "Missing Child Parents" after her daughter was abducted and killed. Miriam was killed by militants who broke into her home on May 10, 2017. ==Life== She was named Miriam Elizabeth Rodriguez Martinez and lived in the community of San Fernando, Mexico. She was killed on May 10, 2017, the day when Mexico celebrates Mother's Day. She got injured severely and died on the way to hospital. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Mexican activists
